message:
redesign homepage with unified chronological view

- merged songs/writing/albums into single chronological list
- added filter navigation: all | songs | writing | albums | rad.io
- visual hierarchy: active filter (black/bold), inactive (grey), rad.io (blue link)
- consistent spacing with invisible placeholders for writing entries
- removed non-functional subscribe form
- footer updated with releases link

fix lyrics formatting: restore verse breaks

- re-extracted lyrics from backup HTML files
- preserves blank lines between verses/choruses
- displays correctly with white-space: pre-line CSS

fix broken image references

- albums/hard-hitter.html: /dev/images/ → /images/
- radio.html: typo it-aint-pretty-artwor.jpg → it-aint-pretty-artwork.jpg
- songs.json: add missing artwork field for it-aint-pretty

cleanup: remove unused files and empty directories

- weather.html (old standalone page)
- power.html (old standalone page)
- dev/ (old development files)
- other/ (empty)
- masters/ (empty)

add releases page with github commit history

- fetches recent commits from github api
- styled to match site aesthetic with kp/weather/cpu header
- cron job updates hourly

migrate writing to json template system

- writing-template.html with kp index, tooltips, home link
- all 6 poems in data/writing.json
- delete static html files (backed up to ~/backup/)

add kp index and tooltips to song template header

- kp index with colored indicator matching homepage
- hover tooltips on all three metrics (weather, kp, cpu)
- rad.typo header now links to homepage
- optimized css and js

migrate songs to json template system

- add apache rewrite rules (.htaccess)
- all 12 songs now served via song-template.html + data/songs.json
- add writing-template.html + data/writing.json for poems
- delete static html files (backed up to ~/backup/songs-static-html/)
